name: DZap
intro: Unify multi-step processes in DeFi into one
introduce: DZap is a decentralized platform that aims to deliver a breakthrough in user experience for trading in DeFi. DZap‘s vision is to enable users to effortlessly invest and trade multiple tokens and eventually NFTs on DeZap. Its first mission to develop batch buy/sell/send support for tokens & NFTs by using the best DEX aggregator and marketplace respectively. This aim seeks to optimise investment opportunities in the existing crypto & NFT ecosystem.
